footer: %s is made bi volunteers, hostit on %s an translatit via %s.
github_link_title: Hey! Ma soorce is on GitHub!
instructions_details: Click %s tae gae tae Wikipaedia an fix the snippet, or %s tae see anither ane. Check %s if ye hae quaistiens. Good luck!
instructions_goal: The Wikipaedia snippet ablo isna backed bi a {link_start}reliable source{link_end}. Can ye find ane?
introduction: Help find citations for Wikipaedia airticles!
lead_section_hint: This text is pairt o the airticle's lead section, sae referencin it mey be optional. Please see %s for mair information.
page_not_found_text: The page ye are leukin for na langer exeests â€” perhaps this citation haes awready been foond? Gae back tae %s for mair!
